name: places/ChIJ3XRg3J5ZwokR6zYkAgY87bQ
adrFormatAddress: 114 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10003-5510, USA

editorialSummary.text: Urban shop with an outdoor patio offering hand-rolled bagels, housemade cheese spreads & sandwiches.

originalText.text:
Est. 2015

Layout/atmosphere
*Bagel collage on the walls; six tables

Food/drink
*Bacon, egg & cheese on sesame bagel - good; bagel itself was a bit small

text.text:
Est. 2015

Layout/atmosphere
*Bagel collage on the walls; six tables

Food/drink
*Bacon, egg & cheese on sesame bagel - good; bagel itself was a bit small

originalText.text: Excellent bagels in a wide variety of flavors. Service is fast. My omelette was a little bland, but the bagel was great. Atmosphere is utilitarian, but if you're focusing on the food, then it's fine.

text.text: Excellent bagels in a wide variety of flavors. Service is fast. My omelette was a little bland, but the bagel was great. Atmosphere is utilitarian, but if you're focusing on the food, then it's fine.

originalText.text:
Last meal in NYC‚Ä¶ ü•≤ and we didn‚Äôt have much time for it. Plus we had lots of luggage so I stayed in the lobby of the apprtment we rented while my wife went to Bagel Belly, around the corner‚Ä¶ because how could we leave NYC without having a bagel? üòá
I had to wait a very long time in that lobby because Estefania wasn‚Äôt coming back‚Ä¶ She told me there wasn‚Äôt so many people but it took them such a long time to make 3 sandwiches!‚Ä¶üò§
She also came back with 1 coke, not 2, or 3‚Ä¶ she told me there was a lunch special. So I asked her why she didn‚Äôt come back with 3 cokes‚Ä¶ it turns out she realized there was a lunch special with a free drink after being served and, by chance, one of the bagels she ordered was in the lunch special‚Ä¶ but nobody told her that. She had to see the next person getting their free drink. It seems the clerk didn‚Äôt care enough to mention it‚Ä¶ ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
My bagel was a mixed pastrami and corned beef bagel. It was very good, very soft‚Ä¶ of course, not as good as Katz‚Äôs pastrami, but still more than decent. Especially for $10 and such a big bagel.
A good option for lunch‚Ä¶ but not if your in a hurry‚Ä¶ üòú

Quality & taste: 8/10
Quantities: 10/10
Atmosphere: 7/10
Originality: 8/10
Ratio price / quality: 8/10
Service: 3/10
How I felt afterwards: 7/10

originalText.text: So I love the vibes here! great little out door space for nice days and nice bright interior with very welcoming and friendly staff! They got excellent selection of warm cold and hot foods and we‚Äôll finally to the reason it‚Äôs only 3* partly because I can‚Äôt do 3.4 but alas I only had the Gluten Free(GF)bagels so THIS is review for that only and although it was pretty decent though now the GF world of breads, bagels etc‚Ä¶. Has gotten more Sophisticated in evolution that it just can‚Äôt beat the best versions which are almost indistinguishable from the real thing‚Ä¶. And this fell short so hence the rating

originalText.text: I come here quite often in the morning. $8 for  double egg, meat and cheese bagel. Bagels are delicious and soft. I love the perfect amount of salt added on the everything bagel as it makes a perfect balance. Bacon and sausage are both good as well. Definitely recommend! Line can get busy on weekends! Order ahead

text.text: I come here quite often in the morning. $8 for  double egg, meat and cheese bagel. Bagels are delicious and soft. I love the perfect amount of salt added on the everything bagel as it makes a perfect balance. Bacon and sausage are both good as well. Definitely recommend! Line can get busy on weekends!
